projects.title: SmartShopper
projects.description: An app that compares prices across major supermarkets to optimize a user's shopping list. Key components include UI, data collection, and price comparison algorithms.

projects.title: Mediphix
projects.description: A platform for managing and viewing patient visits, diagnoses, and prescriptions across medical institutions, aimed at reducing misdiagnosis through synchronized patient history.

projects.title: Highlights
projects.description: A task management app that integrates with calendars, inspired by 'Make Time.' It helps users prioritize tasks and goals while providing a concise daily overview.
